name: Panik (Daiqi Cui)
description:
Panik is a film, a game and an experience. 

When the deadline is coming, panic is always coming with it. What should we do? Hopefully, someone can come and save us from the painful struggle.

Welcome to enjoy the film and help our little artist get out from the exhausting deadline eve.

After the film:

Press E on an object to read more stories about the artist and her life.

Press E to start the inspection, press E again to quit inspection.

Press R to drop the item.

Press E to catch the flying crumpled paper and press Q to use the suggestion and help her to get out of the chaos.
